text: Orth.-Hear the Lord God speaking through the prophet Ezekiel "The sold that sinneth it shall die."[fn-34-P3485_979267:17-nf] Moreover through the great Moses He saith "If a soul sin-"[fn-34-P3486_979363:18-nf] And again "It shall come to pass that every soul that will not hear that prophet shall be cut off."[fn-34-P3487_979479:19-nf] And many other passages of the same kind may be found.
title: Dialogue II.-The Unconfounded.
author: Theodoret
